description.value:
Your unparalleled athletic skill allows you to jump impossible distances. Triple the distance you jump on a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] (so you could jump 90 feet with an Athletics result of 30). When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump], use the distance jumped and distance limit for a Long Jump but don't triple the distance.

You can jump a distance greater than your Speed by spending additional actions when you Long Jump or High Jump. For each additional action spent, add your Speed to the distance limit.
